item.description:
@Ceres wrote:

Okay well I’ve just recently added Player Owned Shops to my server, and instead of replacing the “attack” option with “View Shop”, I replaced the “follow” option with “View Shop”.

Now I didn’t really replace it, I just made it so if you are not in a PVP Area, it views the other player’s shop.

For some reason it will not work correctly.

} if(!c.isInPvP()) { c.getShops().openPlayerShop((Client)Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex]); c.npcIndex = 0; c.playerIndex = 0; c.followId = 0;

I made it so when you use “View Shop”, the Follow ID is 0 which makes it stop following. But it still will not open player shops.
Am I suppose to define something for Player Index? Please Help!
